properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Point Reyes to Pigeon Point California out to 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 8 at 2:24AM PST until January 9 at 9:00PM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the first Small Craft Advisory, seas 7 to 10 feet at
12 seconds expected. For the second Small Craft Advisory,
northwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Point Reyes to Pigeon Point
California out to 10 nm.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 3 PM PST this
afternoon. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 3 AM to 9 PM PST
Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 PM PST THURSDAY
